function_call.name: classify_risks
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Ineffective culture based on resilience, change management, and agile principles","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of real-life data or full business cases to evaluate the quantitative impacts of the coronavirus pandemic","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of projector company-specific data due to limited data tracking during the pandemic","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Construction site suspensions and slow progress hindering data collection","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of guidelines for handling unprecedented events in the construction industry","category":"Control and Prevention Measures risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of validation for research results","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Difficulty in acquiring quantitative data during a pandemic","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of implementing unvalidated best practices in construction projects","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential transmission of contagious diseases due to increased collaboration and reliance on diversified suppliers and manufacturers.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Labor shortage and increase in unemployment levels leading to overcrowded workplaces and job sites.","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"New research streams related to workforce-related issues, project and workplace considerations, procurement and supply chain implications, and contractual, legal, and insurance aspects.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Future research work on covid-19 in the construction industry could lead to increased exposure to the virus","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Expansion of the study to different countries and sectors may lead to the global spread of covid-19 variants","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying on wearable devices for early detection of asymptomatic and pre-symptomatic cases of covid-19.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of smartwatch data and self-reported symptoms to detect covid-19 may lead to false positives or false negatives.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Reliance on online detection algorithms may lead to privacy and data security risks for participants’ health data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overreliance on smartwatch data for covid-19 detection may lead to overmedicalization and unnecessary interventions.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sample bias due to limited access to wearable devices by older people and low-income populations","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on large datasets for training detection algorithms","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Inclusion of additional sensors could lead to increased risk of contamination and spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Algorithmic decision-making process reliant on sensor data could be influenced by external factors such as travel, diet, and other health conditions, leading to inaccurate diagnostic outcomes.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Wearable sensors may not be practical to wear many different sensors at one time, leading to limited data collection.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate measurements due to external factors influencing analyte concentrations in sweat.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Face masks with integrated sensors could provide a false sense of security if not properly calibrated or maintained.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Individualized decision-making based on large volumes of data may not be accurate or effective in predicting infected individuals.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Challenges related to data security, encryption, ethics, and regulation may arise from the integrated approach of continuous data collection and communication.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on data mining and machine learning may lead to over-reliance on correlations and inaccurate predictions.","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases in academic research centers","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited ventilation and air circulation in research laboratories","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"International collaboration leading to cross-border disease transmission","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of focus on indoor health factors","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited attention to occupant health research","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on subjective assessments for health evaluation","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Residential cooking as a substantial source of indoor air pollutants leading to respiratory problems","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Effects of ergonomics on musculoskeletal disorders in office spaces","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relation between ieq indoor environmental quality and fatigue, tiredness, headaches, and attention/focus in office and educational buildings","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited implementation of occupant health concepts in building design and construction","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of integration of human health knowledge into building design and operation","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Data-related challenges for delivering buildings that support and promote occupant health","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor air quality leading to the spread of airborne viruses and diseases","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of consideration for human-building interactions and spatial organization","category":"Behavioral risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate focus on healthy building principles in design and construction","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of understanding of the impact of buildings on occupant health","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low adoption of health objectives by building practitioners","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited understanding and awareness of health in buildings among building professionals","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases through indoor environments","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of ventilation and indoor air quality can lead to the spread of contagious diseases within the building environment.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close spatial organization and lack of physical distancing measures can contribute to the transmission of contagious diseases among occupants.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate temperature control and fluctuations can weaken the immune systems of building occupants, increasing their susceptibility to contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global health crisis covid-19 pandemic impacting professional opinions regarding occupant health in buildings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"}]}
